message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.PL

The paper deals with access control requirements and proposes a framework for synthesizing local access-control policies from global requirements for physical spaces. This involves the use of an algorithm and an expressive language to specify both global requirements and physical spaces. The paper is likely to belong to the categories of computer security (cs.CR), software engineering (cs.SE), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), systems and control (cs.SY), and programming languages (cs.PL).
